INVALID_MINIMUM_PASSWORD_LENGTH: Password must be at least 8 characters long
INVALID_MAXIMUM_PASSWORD_LENGTH: Password must be less than 65 characters
INVALID_LOWER_CASE: Password must contain at least 1 lower case letter
INVALID_UPPER_CASE: Password must contain at least 1 upper case letter
INVALID_NUMERIC_CHARACTER: Password must contain at least 1 numeric digit
INVALID_SPECIAL_CHARACTER: Password must contain at least 1 special character
